DOC.brief_summary: Effect of Meal Replacement Beverage(Glucerna) on Body Composition,lipid metabolism and blood pressure
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Meal Replacement Beverage(Glucerna) on Body Composition,Lipid Metabolism and Blood Pressure
DOC.detailed_description: The Effect of Meal Replacement Beverage(Glucerna) on Body Composition,lipid metabolism and blood pressure in Patients with Obesity
DOC.criteria: 1. age：14~60years 2. BMI ≥ 28kg/m2 3. without liver, kidney, gastrointestinal and other major organic serious diseases,lactating women, pregnancy
